languages.text: "Лишь то, что они грозят сложившемуся порядку вещей. Погибнет правительница — и этот мир окажется в опасности".
"Only that they threaten the established order. There is much risk to this world should the ruler die."
languages.original_text: "Лишь то, что они грозят сложившемуся порядку вещей. Погибнет правительница — и этот мир окажется в опасности".

traits.locale_text: "Only that they threaten the established order. If the ruler dies, people across this entire planet will know the horror of anarchy."
"Only that they threaten the established order. If the ruler dies, people across this entire planet will know the horror of anarchy."
"Only that they threaten the established order. If the ruler dies, people across this entire planet will know the horror of anarchy."
"Only that they threaten the established order. There is much risk to this world should the ruler die."

languages.text: “我只知道，他们在威胁已有的秩序。一旦统治者身亡，这个世界一定会陷入巨大的风险之中。”
languages.original_text: "Only that they threaten the established order. There is much risk to this world should the ruler die."

traits.locale_text: “我只知道，他们在威胁这颗行星的秩序。一旦统治者身亡，整颗行星上的人都将体会到无政府状态有多么恐怖。”

languages.text: «Solo que amenazan al orden establecido. Sin su gobernante, el planeta corre graves riesgos».
languages.original_text: "Only that they threaten the established order. There is much risk to this world should the ruler die."

traits.locale_text: «Solo que amenazan al orden establecido. Sin su gobernante, la gente de todo el planeta conocerá los horrores de la anarquía».

languages.text: 「元々ある体制を脅かすだけだな。支配者が死ぬ方が、この惑星にとってリスクが高い」
languages.original_text: "Only that they threaten the established order. There is much risk to this world should the ruler die."

traits.locale_text: 「既存の体制を脅かしているということしか私は知らない。統治者が亡くなれば、この星中の人民が無政府状態の恐ろしさを味わうことになる」

languages.text: "Nur, dass sie die etablierte Ordnung bedrohen. Diese Welt ist stark bedroht, wenn ihr Herrscher sterben sollte."
languages.original_text: "Only that they threaten the established order. There is much risk to this world should the ruler die."

traits.locale_text: "Nur, dass sie die etablierte Ordnung bedrohen. Wenn die Herrscherin stirbt, werden alle auf dem gesamten Planeten die Schrecken der Anarchie erfahren."

languages.text: « Seulement que ces gens menacent l'ordre établi. Ce monde courrait un grand danger si sa dirigeante venait à disparaître. »
languages.original_text: "Only that they threaten the established order. There is much risk to this world should the ruler die."

traits.locale_text: « Seulement que ces gens menacent l'ordre établi. Si la dirigeante meurt, tous les habitants de cette planète connaîtront l'horreur de l'anarchie. »

languages.original_text: "Only that they threaten the established order. There is much risk to this world should the ruler die."

languages.text: "Kurulu düzeni tehdit ettiklerini yalnızca. Hükümdar öldüğünde bu dünya büyük risk altında kalır."
languages.original_text: "Only that they threaten the established order. There is much risk to this world should the ruler die."

traits.locale_text: "Kurulu düzeni tehdit ettiklerini yalnızca. Hükümdar öldüğünde bu dünya büyük risk altında kalır."
